title: Ndabagi01
author: Ndabagi01
content: Microstrategy can not stop buying more bitcoins to their holdings whenever there is a dip in the market. They had to hold special shareholder vote to sell their shares to buy more bitcoins. They happen to be the world largest corporate holder of bitcoin.There decisions on how they accumulate more bitcoin, is just an indication that bitcoin is not going back to zero. They are big companies that will not want their company to go bankrupt and have chosen to invest more of their holdings into bitcoin because of its long term benefits. I see no reason why some people will still be talking ill of bitcoin when such a company can do this and not feel bad about losing their assets. Microstrategy’s move should be an encourager to attract more investors to invest into bitcoin and not get the thought of their money not been profitable or lose their investment in the long time.

comments.body: It doesn't seem so, the price is still stuck at $94K.Although the logic is make sense, but make sure people not just rely on Microstrategy. comments.author: BALIK
comments.body: Microstrategy's continued accumulation of bitcoin is an extremely positive sign and could create FOMO in the market. But don't forget that their average purchase price hovers around $62k, which means their investment is yielding huge returns even as they continue to buy bitcoin at prices above $100k. In investing, different capital and buying positions will create different advantages, so don't just rely on them and take it as a golden signal that bitcoin will continue to grow and the market will continue to rise just because they are still buying bitcoin. They can also sell bitcoins and take profit at any time without informing us. So we should have a holistic view of the bigger picture of the market, don't just focus on them or anyone and take it as a market signal.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on December 24, 2024, 08:28:30 AMThey might forced to sold their coins during bear season if they don't have enough money to pay operational expenses.You don't know MSTR's business model. The operational expenses of the Treasury part is minimal, and the part that does have more expenses, which is Business Intelligence, has been consistently leaving around 75 million dollars of net profit for many years, that is after paying expenses. In other words, the ability to pay operational expenses does not depend at all on the price of bitcoin.

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: Everybody who celebrates the aggressive accumulation of Bitcoin by Micro Strategy seems blind to the future negativity we will inevitably have to ingest.  Why do people believe MS is going to purchase Bitcoin in huge chunks and never sell it?  What if it was actually a plan to crash the Market and make way for the much Wealthier investors?  The constant purchases should be food for thought.Saylor will one day sell a portion of his Bitcoin.  Whether that is a few months or years down the line, it is up to him and his own choice to make.  The point is.  Do not be blinded by the temporary Bullish news.  All you can do at this point is hope that Saylor will NOT crash the Market once he decides he has had enough Profits.

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: It's definitely a bullish sign. Also it is possible that Michael Saylor knows something which we don't. But all in all, these are bullish signs. When a lot of countries are actively discussing about creating a Bitcoin reserve, investing in it, is usually a good idea. Bitcoin is not going back to zero, ever. period. Otherwise big asset managers like Bigrock had never invested in it. Bitcoin is volatile but the long term outlook seems very bullish.

You are right that Microstrategy vision is strong and they keep on buying bitcoin even if the value is bitcoin is over 100,000$. When other companies see these investments and how this company is growing, they will also decide to put bitcoin on their balance sheet. This is bullish for bitcoin and ofcourse it won't go to zero but all this does not mean that we will not have a correction in bitcoin. There will be corrections, market manipulation and all others news / fuds that will derive the market price but overall we will be bullish over the coming months and years. All we need to see a big picture and not get afraid of daily/Weekly dumps and corrections.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: These guys single-handedly raise each person's confidence in buying bitcoin. If you are a newbie looking to buy bitcoin but is hesitant to do so, then you stumble upon an article outlining how Microstrategy continues on buying bitcoins in huge volumes despite negative market sentiment, you'll also be compelled to buy because you might think there is something they know that you don't - and it just makes sense even if you don't know what exactly that thing is because they just keep on making money.What I only fear about MSTR doing this is that they will become too big to fail, or that one single mistake on their part can send bitcoin's price crashing down into levels that we left a long time ago. There will be a time when MSTR is just controlling an absurd percentage of the market and there's nothing we can do about it.

comments.author: BlackBoss_

They can not apply same strategy of MicroStrategy and other Bitcoin investors. They can learn basic steps and adjust it for their own investment capital management including risk management.MicroStrategy use DCA strategy, that can work for all investors but a prerequiste is they must have proper capital management to apply this strategy in a long time. Purchasing bitcoin gradually with time, but holding it tightly toward future with good effects from DCA on their investment ROI.

comments.body: Quote from: PrivacyG on December 24, 2024, 02:26:39 PMSaylor will one day sell a portion of his Bitcoin.  Where did you see that?
